summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from June 2, 2021, coordinating an interview related to a child exploitation and human trafficking task force investigation. The emails discuss confirming an interview time, assigning note-taking duties, and sharing exhibits for the interview.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: Appears as a sender/recipient in emails coordinating an interview for a child exploitation and human trafficking task force investigation.

events.title: Interview Coordination
events.description: Law enforcement officials coordinate an interview, confirm the availability of an individual, assign note-taking duties, and share exhibits for the interview.

keyFacts: The emails are from June 2, 2021, and relate to a child exploitation and human trafficking task force investigation.
The correspondence involves planning for an interview, including confirming an individual's availability and sharing exhibits.
The task force is a joint NYPD/FBI operation focused on child exploitation and human trafficking.
